verses.text: A Psalm for Thanksgiving. Make a joyful noise to the Lord, all the earth.
Serve the Lord with gladness; Come before his presence with exultation.
Know that the Lord he is God; He made us, and not we ourselves; We arehis people, and the sheep of his pasture.
Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, And his courts with hymns; Give thanks to him, praise his name.
For the Lord is good, his mercy is forever; And his truth enduresto generation and generation.
